title: Vestment, 1800–1850
medium:
Medium: silk, linen
Technique: block printed on plain weave
description: White silk printed in red, yellow, green, and blue in a design of a nosegay whose leaves and flowers are outlined in a beaded effect by small black dots. The blue is bright cobalt. Lined with faded blue linen and trimmed with yellow tapes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Vestment, 1800–1850.
1800–1850. Medium: silk, linen
Technique: block printed on plain weave. Gift of Rodman A. Heeren. 1960-151-3.
